data.name: War Thunder - German Beginner's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Note!

To activate this DLC for your Gaijin account, it has to be linked to Steam account that made the purchase. If you aren't sure it is, please follow the instruction. If you still have any questions, contact our support (login on the same website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • SdKfz 140/1 (Rank 1 Germany);
  • Ju 87R-2 (Rank 1 Germany);
  • 120000 Silver Lions;
  • Premium Account for 7 days.

SdKfz 140/1

The invasion of the USSR demonstrated that German APCs weren’t suited well for reconnaissance tasks due to poor roads, thus the first scout tanks were developed. The Aufklarungspanzer 38(t) is based on the Pz.38(t) light tank and features an automatic 20mm gun. The unusual mesh cover at the top protected the crew from hand-grenades. This is one of the fastest Rank 1 vehicles in the game with strong frontal armour, and it is a perfect choice for the quick capture of strategic points.

Ju 87R-2

The Ju 87R-2 is a long-range bomber modification developed in the late 1930s based on the Ju 87B-2. They were used in the battle in North Africa, where they were additionally modified for tropical conditions with an anti-dust filter and additional protection for the weapon compartments installed. The Ju 87R-2 is armed with two 7.92 mm MG 17 machine guns and also a turret with a 7.92 mm MG 15 machine gun is installed for rear hemisphere protection. The aircraft is able to carry a 250, 500 or a 1000 kg bomb.


Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
